title: User Authentication - Successful Login
description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid credentials across all roles (User, Admin, Super Admin).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role.
Verify the user session is established securely.

title: User Authentication - Failed Login
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input an invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify an error message indicating invalid credentials is shown.
Confirm that no session is created and user remains on login page.

title: User Signup - Successful Registration
description: Validate that new users can successfully register with all required information and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Fill in all mandatory fields with valid data, including role selection.
Submit the signup form.
Verify user is created and redirected to login or dashboard as appropriate.
Check for confirmation email or message if implemented.

title: Password Recovery - Valid Email
description: Ensure users can request password recovery using a registered email and receive reset instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Enter a valid registered email address.
Submit the password recovery request.
Verify that a password reset email or message is sent.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that each user role (User, Admin, Super Admin) is restricted or granted access appropriately to features and pages.

steps.description: Login as User role.
Attempt to access Admin and Super Admin features.
Verify access is denied with appropriate message or redirect.
Login as Admin role.
Attempt to access Super Admin features.
Verify access is denied with appropriate message or redirect.
Login as Super Admin.
Verify full access to all system features and settings.

title: Task Management - CRUD Operations
description: Verify users can create, view, update, and delete tasks successfully with all related fields including categorization, status, and deadlines.

steps.description: Login as a User.
Create a new task with title, description, category, status, and deadline.
Verify the task appears with correct details in task list and views.
Edit the existing task modifying its fields including status.
Verify updates are saved and reflected correctly.
Delete the task.
Verify task is removed from all views.

title: Task Management - Drag and Drop Reordering
description: Confirm users can reorder tasks using drag-and-drop and that the new order is persisted across sessions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to task board.
Drag a task item to a new position or category column.
Validate the UI updates to reflect the new order immediately.
Refresh or logout and log back in.
Verify that the reordered task positions persist.

title: Task Management - Status Updates and Visual Indicators
description: Check that task status updates (In Progress, Completed, Overdue) display correct visual indicators and status summary is accurate.

steps.description: Create multiple tasks with different due dates and statuses.
Verify each task displays correct status and visual indicators (e.g., color coding).
Update task status to Completed.
Confirm status updates visually and in statistics dashboard.
Set a task deadline in the past to test Overdue display.
Confirm task is marked as Overdue visually.

title: Academic Management - Course Creation and Bulk Import
description: Validate that admins can create, edit, and bulk import courses and that imported data is accurately saved and displayed.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Create a new course with all mandatory details and associate teachers.
Confirm course appears correctly in course list and details.
Edit the course details.
Verify edits persist and reflect in UI.
Perform bulk import of courses with a valid CSV file.
Confirm all imported courses are correctly created with proper associations.

title: Study Materials Management - Upload and Organization
description: Test uploading, organizing, and deleting study materials linked to specific courses.

steps.description: Login as Educator or Admin.
Upload multiple study material files and link them to courses.
Verify uploaded materials display under correct courses.
Reorganize materials within the course.
Confirm the new organization order persists.
Delete a study material file.
Verify material is removed and no longer accessible.

title: Lecture Slides Management - Upload, Preview and Organization
description: Validate uploading lecture slides, preview functionality, and organization tied to specific course sections.

steps.description: Login as Educator or Admin.
Upload lecture slide files and associate with course sections.
Verify slides appear under correct section lists.
Preview lecture slides using the built-in previewer.
Confirm the preview content loads correctly without errors.
Rearrange slides and check that order persists.
Delete a lecture slide.
Confirm it is removed from the system.

title: Announcement Management - Create, Edit, Filter Announcements
description: Test creating, modifying, and filtering announcements by user sections.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Section Admin.
Create a new announcement with title, content, and target sections.
Verify announcement appears in the announcement list filtered by section.
Edit the announcement content.
Confirm changes are saved and visible.
Apply filters for specific sections.
Verify only matching announcements are displayed.

title: Admin Dashboard - Real-Time Metrics and Analytics Display
description: Verify that user statistics, task analytics, and real-time metrics update correctly and display using visual charts.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Verify dashboard displays greeting, current date, and time filters.
Validate that charts for user activity, tasks, and system metrics render correctly.
Trigger changes in user/task data (create, update, delete).
Confirm dashboard metrics update in real-time or on refresh.

title: User Management - Promotion, Demotion, Deletion
description: Ensure admins can promote, demote, and delete users with UI feedback and data integrity.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to the user list and select a user.
Promote the user role (e.g., from User to Admin).
Verify the role is updated and reflected in UI and permissions.
Demote the user role.
Confirm role change is persisted.
Delete a user account.
Validate the user is removed from user lists and access is revoked.

title: Super Admin - Audit Logs Accessibility and Admin Management
description: Confirm Super Admin can view detailed audit logs, create, edit, manage other admins, and access full analytics.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin.
Navigate to audit logs and verify log entries contain accurate timestamped user actions.
Check for filtering and search capabilities in audit logs.
Create a new Admin user account.
Verify new admin appears in admin list and can login.
Edit an existing Admin's details.
Confirm changes persist.
Access system-wide analytics and verify data correctness.

title: Notification System - Push and In-App Notifications
description: Verify push notifications via Capacitor and Firebase and in-app alerts trigger correctly for task deadlines and announcements on all supported devices.

steps.description: Login as a User on mobile and web.
Create a task with an upcoming deadline and an announcement targeted to user section.
Confirm in-app notifications appear timely before deadline and upon announcement creation.
Validate push notifications are received on mobile devices.
Dismiss or interact with notifications.
Verify notification state updates correctly.

title: Side Navigation Responsiveness and Usability
description: Test side navigation collapses, expands, and responds appropriately for mobile, tablet, and desktop with tab management.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Interact with the side navigation menu to collapse and expand it.
Verify the menu behaves responsively and maintains usability across devices.
Test tab management by opening multiple tabs from side navigation.
Confirm tabs function correctly, switching and closing as expected.

title: Search and Filtering Across Tasks, Courses, and Materials
description: Verify that search and filtering features return accurate results and handle edge cases such as no matches or special characters.

steps.description: Navigate to search interfaces for tasks, courses, and study materials.
Enter valid keywords and apply filters.
Confirm relevant results are displayed correctly.
Search using special characters, very long strings, and empty queries.
Verify system handles inputs gracefully without crashes and displays appropriate messages when no results found.

title: Performance - Lazy Loading, Caching, and Virtualization
description: Ensure lists (tasks, users, courses) implement lazy loading, client-side caching, and virtualization to maintain UI responsiveness with large data sets.

steps.description: Populate the system with large datasets for tasks, users, and courses.
Navigate to lists and scroll through data.
Verify data is loaded incrementally (lazy loading) without UI freezes.
Confirm caching reduces server calls on repeated access.
Validate virtualization is used and list rendering performance meets responsiveness criteria.

title: UI Accessibility and Offline Support
description: Validate that the application UI is accessible (including screen reader compatibility), responsive to different screen sizes, provides offline support, and smooth animations.

steps.description: Operate the application on multiple device sizes: desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Verify responsive layout adapts and usability is preserved.
Enable offline mode (disconnect network).
Confirm users can interact with cached data and receive appropriate offline indicators.
Use screen reader and accessibility tools to navigate the interface.
Check that all interactive elements are reachable and properly labeled.
Observe UI animations and transitions.
Verify animations are smooth and do not cause jank or delays.

title: Security - Data Privacy and Secure Backend Access
description: Test that data privacy is maintained, environment variables are protected, and backend access is securely controlled via Supabase RLS rules.

steps.description: Attempt to access user data from unauthorized account.
Verify access is denied according to RLS policies.
Inspect network requests to confirm environment variables and secrets are not exposed.
Confirm all sensitive data is transmitted securely and not exposed in frontend code or storage.
Audit data sharing and role permissions to ensure least privilege.
Validate no data leakage between roles, users, or sessions.
